title: 1887 Tobin Lithographs Complete Set For Sale
author: dstudeba

posts.post_title: 1887 Tobin Lithographs Complete Set For Sale
posts.post_content:
Very affordable 19th century set with HOFers.  $4000 delivered.  Please email me at [url]danstudebaker@hotmail.com[/url] with questions.  All cards are the same size, just scanned at different times.

(sorry I don't have a scan of the Glasscock, my scanner is down)

Andrews  Auth
Anson  20
Brouthers  40
Ferguson  20
Glasscock  30
Hines   50
Keefe   10
Kelly   10
McCormick  40
Welch  20
